mapper.select: SELECT ta.id aid,ta.areaname,ta.max_allow,ta.max_time,ta.default_allow,ta.remark, ta.is_exit,ta.emphasis,ta.adjoin,ta.lineString,ta.area_type_id,IFNULL(tt.`name`,'未配置区域类型') area_type_name, tt.path,ta1.id s_id,ta1.areaname s_areaname,ta1.max_allow s_max_allow,ta1.max_time s_max_time,ta1.default_allow s_default_allow, ta1.emphasis s_emphasis,ta1.is_exit s_is_exit,ta1.worker_timeout s_worker_timeout,ta1.remark s_remark,ta.e_point,ta.n_point,tan.area_sensor_id FROM t_env_area ta LEFT JOIN t_area_type tt ON tt.id=ta.area_type_id LEFT JOIN t_area_neighbor tan ON ta.id=tan.m_area_id LEFT JOIN t_area ta1 ON tan.s_area_id=ta1.id

areaname=#{areaname},
max_allow=#{max_allow}, max_time=#{max_time}, default_allow=#{default_allow},
is_exit=#{is_exit},
emphasis=#{emphasis}, worker_timeout=#{worker_timeout},
remark=#{remark},
adjoin=#{adjoin},
lineString=#{lineString},
n_point=#{n_point}, e_point=#{e_point},
area_type_id=#{area_type_id}
id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id,t1.station,t2.ipaddr,t1.sensorId,t1.sensor_type,t3.v type,t3.pid,t1.uid,t1.alais, t1.sensor_position,IFNULL(t4.v,'未配置位置') position,t1.area_id,t11.areaname FROM t_sensor t1 LEFT JOIN t_substation t2 ON t1.station=t2.id LEFT JOIN t_static t3 ON t1.sensor_type=t3.id LEFT JOIN t_static t4 ON t1.sensor_position=t4.id LEFT JOIN t_env_area t11 ON t1.area_id=t11.id WHERE t1.control!=3 AND t1.area_id=#{area_id} UNION SELECT t5.id,t5.station,t6.ipaddr,t5.sensorId,t5.sensor_type,t7.v type,t7.pid,t5.uid,t5.alais, t5.sensor_position,IFNULL(t8.v,'未配置位置') position,t5.area_id,t12.areaname FROM t_switch_sensor t5 LEFT JOIN t_substation t6 ON t5.station=t6.id LEFT JOIN t_static t7 ON t5.sensor_type=t7.id LEFT JOIN t_static t8 ON t5.sensor_position=t8.id LEFT JOIN t_env_area t12 ON t5.area_id=t12.id WHERE t5.control!=3 AND t5.area_id=#{area_id}
